content:
What I need to check in order that the "Publish Box goes here" is updated with the right IG information ?
I'm asking that because I've some problems with two specific IGs : in one all the page have "Publish Box goes here" header; in another IG some pages have the "Publish Box goes here" and some others show the right information ... Thanks for your kind help...
the html will be populated correctly on the Ci-build. If it doesn't, I'll look at it
